name: NetworkTech-AI News智能数据采集系统

qs.name: q
qs.value: "{{37.`0`}}" AND (acquisition OR merger OR "M&A" OR partnership OR collaboration OR "product launch" OR "new product" OR technology OR announcement OR earnings OR "financial results" OR deal OR investment OR funding OR contract OR agreement OR innovation OR breakthrough OR "strategic partnership" OR "joint venture" OR patent OR "research and development" OR "open source" OR chipset OR semiconductor OR "data center" OR networking OR security OR cloud)

parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

qs.value: "{{37.`0`}}" AND (acquisition OR merger OR "mergers and acquisitions" OR "open source" OR opensource OR "new product" OR "new technology" OR "new chip" OR chipset OR semiconductor OR announcement OR launch OR partnership OR collaboration OR innovation OR breakthrough OR "product release" OR "technology breakthrough" OR "strategic partnership" OR IPO OR funding OR investment OR "research and development" OR patent) after:{{formatDate(addDays(now; -30); "YYYY-MM-DD")}}

parameters.name: handleErrors

qs.name: q
qs.value: \"{{37.`0`}}\" and  ( (acquisition OR merger OR \"mergers and acquisitions\" OR \"open source\" OR opensource OR \"new product\" OR \"new technology\" OR \"new chip\" OR chipset OR semiconductor OR announcement OR launch OR partnership OR collaboration OR innovation OR breakthrough OR \"product release\" OR \"technology breakthrough\" OR \"strategic partnership\" OR IPO OR funding OR investment OR \"research and development\" OR patent) subreddit:technology OR subreddit:business OR subreddit:news

parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays

messages.content:
你是专业的科技新闻分析师。

任务：分析输入的新闻数据，筛选出重要的企业动态。

分类标准：
🔥 收购并购 - acquisition, merger, M&A, deal
🚀 新产品技术 - product launch, technology release  
💼 战略合作 - partnership, collaboration, alliance
🔧 开源项目 - open source, developer tools

评分标准（6-10分）：
10分：行业震撼级事件
9分：重大战略事件  
8分：显著业务事件
7分：一般业务事件
6分：值得关注事件

要求：
1. 只处理30天内的新闻
2. 只输出评分≥6分的新闻
3. 基于真实数据，不得编造
4. 提取真实的标题、链接、时间
5.发布时间请使用YYYY-MM-DD格式
6.输出格式必须符合JSON，不要输出其他任何非JSON的数据

输出格式：
{
  "statistics": {
    "total_news": 实际总数,
    "filtered_news": 筛选后数量,
    "high_score_count": 高分新闻数量
  },
  "high_score_news": [
    {
      "company": "企业名称",
      "category": "动态类型",
      "title": "真实标题",
      "summary": "简要摘要",
      "url": "真实链接",
      "source": "来源",
      "published_date": "发布时间",
      "ai_score": 评分,
      "score_reason": "评分理由"
    }
  ]
}

请分析以下新闻数据：

数据：{{30.data}} {{26.data}} {{21.data}}
处理步骤：
1. 解析每条新闻的 title、description、url、publishedAt 字段
2. 识别企业归属（必须是指定的6家）
3. 判断动态类型和重要性评分
4. 筛选出≥6分的新闻


注意：严格基于真实输入数据，不要假设或编造任何信息。
